infobox-image: refer to caption | Robinson signs an autograph in 2014

As a coach: Jacksonville University (2019) | Offensive Analyst | Jacksonville Jaguars (2020) | Offensive Quality Control coach | Jacksonville Jaguars (2021) | Scouting Assistant | Michigan (2022-present) | Assistant Director of Player Personnel

Career highlights and awards: First-team All-American (2010) | Big Ten Offensive Player of the Year (2010) | First-team All-Big Ten (2010) | Second-team All-Big Ten (2011)
